ygData.subject: The Last Kedge pull
ygData.msgSnippet: Did they increase the spawn times of the Swirlspine Guardians lately?  Anyone out there know?  We would pull the first 3, kill them, then do any ressing
ygData.messageBody:
Did they increase the spawn times of the Swirlspine Guardians lately? Anyone
out there know? We would pull the first 3, kill them, then do any ressing
necessary and rebuff only to find that they have respawned. We did this in way
less than the 20 minutes the respawn used to be. I figure we'll be okay once we
get a couple of level 50 enchanters with the groups we had down there, even the
48 enchanter that was there was able to mess the Guardians (wasn't too sure if
he would be able to). I thought we could do it last night, but when we pulled
him someone just got a little jumpy on the evac call because of poor
communication. By the time everyone got back it was already 2am :(

We still need to get a body from down there soon, so any help ya could provide
would be appriciated.

Ailamil Faithbringer
Tarew Marr
